SENTENCE.STRING: (Arabic: موريتانية Mūrītāniyyah), officially the Islamic Republic of Mauritania, is a country in northwest Africa.

is bordered by the Atlantic Ocean on the west, by Senegal on the south-west, by Mali on the east and south-east, by Algeria on the north-east, and by Moroccan-annexed territory of Western Sahara on the north-west.
is named after the ancient Berber kingdom of Mauretania.
The capital and largest city is Nouakchott, located on the Atlantic coast.
